metadata.title: CVE-2017-6446 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: XSS was discovered in Dotclear v2.11.2, affecting admin/blogs.php andadmin/users.php with the sortby and order parameters.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
